title: Packsize's X5 Erected Box System Named Finalist for 2023 MHI Innovation Award - Packaging Strategies
summary: Packsize has introduced the X5 solution, a fully-automated erected box system aimed at the e-commerce industry, which is recognized as a finalist for the 2023 MHI Innovation Award for Best New Innovation. The X5 enhances efficiency, sustainability, and customer service by producing right-sized boxes at high speed, addressing labor shortages, reducing waste, and optimizing shipping logistics.
green_innovation: TRUE. The X5 solution by Packsize contributes to environmental sustainability by reducing packaging waste, minimizing shipping emissions, eliminating the need for void fillers, and enhancing the overall customer experience.
business_innovation: TRUE. The X5 solution represents a new and advanced product innovation for Packsize, significantly differing from its previous offerings and bringing unique benefits to the e-commerce industry.
green_product: TRUE. The X5 solution by Packsize aligns with the definition of a green product as it is designed and manufactured to reduce environmental impact by producing right-sized boxes, minimizing waste, and conserving resources throughout its life cycle.
green_process: TRUE. The X5 solution involves a green process in the manufacturing and packaging industry by automating processes, reducing waste, optimizing energy consumption, and improving sustainability practices.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 333924 - Industrial Truck, Tractor, Trailer, and Stacker Machinery Manufacturing, 326140 - Polystyrene Foam Product Manufacturing, 922160 - Packaging and Labeling Services, 493110 - General Warehousing and Storage
greenwashing: FALSE. The article does not appear to exhibit greenwashing as it accurately describes the sustainable features and benefits of the X5 solution by Packsize without misleading or deceptive claims.
